idea-plugin.name: Conventional Commits Wizard
idea-plugin.description:
Conventional Commits Wizard

A powerful IntelliJ IDEA plugin that helps you write standardized commit messages following the Conventional Commits specification with Gitmoji support.

Features

  • Interactive Wizard: Step-by-step guidance for creating well-structured commit messages
  • Gitmoji Integration: Choose from 70+ emojis to visually represent your changes
  • Smart Defaults: Automatically suggests appropriate emojis based on commit type
  • Complete Conventional Commits Support: Includes type, scope, description, body, footer, and breaking changes
  • Organized Categories: Emojis grouped thematically for easy discovery
  • VCS Integration: Seamlessly integrates with IntelliJ's commit dialog

Usage

Access the wizard from the VCS commit dialog by clicking the "Conventional Commit Wizard" action. Select your commit type, choose an emoji, add a scope (optional), write your description, and the plugin will generate a properly formatted commit message.
